properties.markdownProperty:
- stringProperty named `:Proteus-name`: This will be the name that the system uses to display the element everywhere in the application. **EVERY ARCHETYPE MUST HAVE THIS PROPERTY**
- stringProperty named `:Proteus-acronym`: This acronym will be used as the acronym shown in the document tab. **EVERY DOCUMENT ARCHETYPE MUST HAVE THIS PROPERTY**
- dateProperty named `:Proteus-date`: This property will be set to the system date if the archetype is cloned.
- codeProperty named `:Proteus-code`: This property will auto-increment if value if neccesary. It looks for the higher code with the same prefix and increment it by 1 if the actual number is lower (ignoring suffix).
